channel.title: RetroComputing on Home
channel.description: Recent content in RetroComputing on Home

item.title: Old Computer Challenge - Day 3
item.description: On this day I was sick, so not a lot has happened, but I would like to still briefly share a few thoughts. I’m spending far less time aimlessly surfing the web or watching youtube-videos for hours on end, simply because it’s not very much fun.

item.title: Old Computer Challenge - Day 2
item.description: Day 2 is coming to a close. Today I was at work all day and so didn’t spend a whole lot of time on my slow computer. However, A thought occurred to me recently, because since I subscribed to mastodon a couple of weeks ago and especially since I started following some retro computing related postings (where I discoved the OCC in the first place), I discovered that there’s a thing called
